actions.description: The ki-rin makes two Hoof attacks and one Horn attack, or it makes two Sacred Fire attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d4 + 5) force damage.
actions.name: Hoof

actions.description: 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) radiant damage.
actions.name: Horn

actions.description: 9 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) radiant damage.
actions.name: Sacred Fire

actions.description:
The ki-rin casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17):
At will: light, major image (6th-level version), thaumaturgy

3/day each: cure wounds, dispel magic, lesser restoration, sending

1/day each: banishment, calm emotions, create food and water, greater restoration, plane shift, protection from evil and good, revivify, wind walk
actions.name: Spellcasting

actions.description: The ki-rin moves up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attack.
actions.name: Move

actions.description: The ki-rin makes one Hoof, Horn, or Sacred Fire attack.
actions.name: Smite

specialTraits.description: If the ki-rin fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
specialTraits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)

specialTraits.description: The ki-rin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance
